description:
Wheezing score for the International Study of Asthma and Allergies in Childhood (ISAAC) wheezing module. [Asher MI, Keil U, Anderson HR, et al. 1995 (PubMed ID: 7789502)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/7789502/)

[Search for all ISAAC variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=isaac)
